a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of 15-year-olds in the highest mathematics score level, girls vs.
Assessed through the PISA mathematics scale, which is based on an OECD country mean of 500 points and a standard
deviation of 100 points. The highest level of achievement is reaching a score surpassing 669 on the PISA mathematics
